last_episode_to_air.name: An Invitation
last_episode_to_air.overview: Frustrated by Billy's ability to evade capture, Thomas Catron devises a scheme to lure Billy back for his arrest; The Regulators attack the jail while Billy, aided by Dulcinea, escapes once again.

name: Billy the Kid
overview: An epic romantic adventure series based on the life of famous American outlaw Billy the Kid — from his humble Irish roots, to his early days as a cowboy and gunslinger in the American frontier, to his pivotal role in the Lincoln County War and beyond.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, Billy and his allies square off against his oldest friend Jesse Evans and the corrupt powers of the Santa Fe Ring. When shots are fired, the conflict erupts into the bloody Lincoln County War. Amidst the fighting, Billy will struggle to hang onto his soul—and to the love of his life.

episodes.name: The Immigrants
episodes.overview: It’s 1871. 12-year-old Billy McCarty and his immigrant Irish family have to leave New York and travel west to seek new opportunities. But the journey proves fatal for some.

episodes.name: The Rattler
episodes.overview: Kathleen and her sons Billy and Joe travel on to Santa Fe. Life is hard, but she meets and marries a man who might change everything for the better – only to find that he makes it a lot worse.

episodes.name: Antrim
episodes.overview: Antrim, Kathleen and the two boys relocate to Silver City, trying to start a new life, but all their dreams are shattered — and Billy loses everything.

episodes.name: Interlude
episodes.overview: Billy finds fresh trouble when he falls in with a character called Alias. He kills a man in self-defense and ends up on the run, and then in the arms of a young woman — who also happens to be the girlfriend of Jesse Evans.

episodes.name: The Little Bit of Paradise
episodes.overview: Billy, on the move again, ends up in Chihuahua, Mexico, with a new Mexican friend called Segura. Together they enjoy several risky escapades – but in the end, Billy risks losing his life.

episodes.name: Fate
episodes.overview: Billy bumps into a new character called Pat Garrett, who is riding with Jesse and the 7 Rivers Gang. Billy joins them – but law makers are already closing in. They plan to flee to Lincoln County – but not before Billy fulfils one last promise.

episodes.name: At the House
episodes.overview: Billy rides into Lincoln County to join up with the gang, who are working for Lincoln’s most powerful boss, Major Murphy. Murphy wants them to get rid of his new competitor, John Tunstall. Billy finds himself torn between the two rivals.

episodes.name: The Rampage
episodes.overview: We are on the eve of the Lincoln County War. Jesse and the gang are encouraged by Murphy to ramp up their attacks on those famers, mostly Mexican, who have signed up with Tunstall. It’s the last straw for Billy, and he decides to change sides.

episodes.name: The Road to Hell
episodes.overview: The Lincoln County War is on the verge of kicking off in a big way. Billy has joined Englishman John Tunstall in his commercial battle with Major Murphy and the House, but even bigger players lurk in the background and the stakes are high.

episodes.name: Sickness
episodes.overview: The war has started, but John Tunstall is hospitalized by a smallpox outbreak.

episodes.name: The Agony
episodes.overview: Billy and the Regulators hear news that John Tunstall’s ranch is going to be raided.

episodes.name: The Day of the Dead
episodes.overview: The Regulators have been on the defensive since the start of war, but Billy draws up a plan which could bring the war to an end.

episodes.name: A Debt Collected
episodes.overview: The del Toboscos fail to repay their debt, leading to an ambush by the 7 Rivers Gang. Billy vows that he and the Regulators will take over Lincoln and clear out the thugs. But, there's a new Sheriff.

episodes.name: The Plea
episodes.overview: Billy and the Regulators turn McSween's house into their HQ, and are supported by the Mexicans; a confrontation with the 7 Rivers Gang leads to a fusillade of bullets.

episodes.name: The Blood-Soaked Bible
episodes.overview: With Lincoln on lockdown, Murphy's House celebrates; Regulators look-out shoots a soldier.

episodes.name: An Invitation
episodes.overview: Frustrated by Billy's ability to evade capture, Thomas Catron devises a scheme to lure Billy back for his arrest; The Regulators attack the jail while Billy, aided by Dulcinea, escapes once again.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season two, Billy and his allies square off against his oldest friend Jesse Evans and the corrupt powers of the Santa Fe Ring. When shots are fired, the conflict erupts into the bloody Lincoln County War. Amidst the fighting, Billy will struggle to hang onto his soul—and to the love of his life.
